belongs_to_collection.name: Jake Jackson's Boys of Summer Series

overview: Quick flings, sweaty guys and hot sex: these are the ingredients for a beautiful, memorable summe. This volume is filled with those hot sweaty sessions we'll never forget from those summers filled with crazy exciting adventure. From nubile newbie Asher Hawk to the delectable redheaded veteran Kennedy Carter, these are the Boys of Summer. Enjoy...
title: Boys of Summer
